caption: Relating to the applicability of sex offender registration requirements to the offense of improper relationship between educator and student.
undersanding:
Summary (under 80 words):
This bill amends the Code of Criminal Procedure to include "improper relationship between educator and student" as a reportable conviction requiring sex offender registration. This applies to all educators and students regardless of nationality, including Chinese educators or students in Texas. The law affects anyone convicted of this offense, regardless of citizenship status.

中文翻译：
该法案修改《刑事诉讼法》，将"教育工作者与学生之间的不当关系"列入需要进行性犯罪者登记的应报告定罪范围。这适用于所有教育工作者和学生，包括在德克萨斯州的中国教育工作者或学生。该法律适用于所有被判犯有此罪行的人，无论其公民身份如何。

Most likely committees:
1. Criminal Justice Committee
2. Education Committee
3. Public Safety Committee
